vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
εὐθύτης [ῠ], ητος, ἡ,
(εὐθύς) straightness, opposed to καμπυλότης, [Refs 4th c.BC+]; opposed to περιφέρεια, [Refs]; εὐ. τριχῶν, opposed to οὐλότης, [Refs]; ἡ εὐ. τῆς τάσεως the direction.., [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__II righteousness, [LXX]
vocabInfos.shortDef: righteousness, uprightness, a figurative extension of a straight (not crooked) object, not found in the NT
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
righteousness, uprightness, a figurative extension of a straight (not crooked) object, not found in the NT
righteousness, uprightness, equity, Heb. 1:8*
